Client.Name: Liaoning Zhongguan Environmental engineering Co., Ltd

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Liaoning Zhongguan Environmental engineering Co., Ltd. was established on December 6, 2007. The company's business scope includes: water environment governance, atmospheric environment governance, and ecological environment governance; Solid waste treatment; Comprehensive utilization of renewable resources; Design and construction general contracting of industrial wastewater and domestic wastewater treatment engineering; Water conservancy exploration and design, construction and maintenance of municipal public works; General contracting of environmental protection engineering construction; Operation, commissioning, and management services for environmental pollution control facilities; Production and sales of environmental protection equipment and engineering materials; Engineering consulting and evaluation; Design, construction, and sales of protective materials for radiation protection engineering; Manufacturing and installation of atmospheric pressure electric hot water boilers, waste heat recovery and energy-saving complete equipment, etc
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Environmental governance promotional videos, environmental videos, satellite remote sensing images, etc
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
